name: Air Purifier and Aroma Diffuser 2.5L (Black)
shortDescription: {Essential Oil Compartment}: This air purifier features a separate essential oil compartment, allowing you to add your favorite essential oils. This not only eases the hassle, but also enhances the ambiance in your home with a pleasant scent, creating a calm and soothing atmosphere.
fullDescription:
{Essential Oil Compartment}: This air purifier features a separate essential oil compartment, allowing you to add your favorite essential oils. This not only eases the hassle, but also enhances the ambiance in your home with a pleasant scent, creating a calm and soothing atmosphere.
{Ultrasonic}: Using ultrasonic technology, this air purifier produces a fine mist that quickly increases air humidity while keeping noise levels to a minimum, ensuring that your rest or work time is not disrupted. Additionally, it comes with an automatic shut-off feature, providing an extra layer of security.
{UV Disinfection and Sterilization}: This air purifier is equipped with a built-in UV light that efficiently eliminates airborne bacteria and viruses, ensuring a clean and healthy environment in your home. This is crucial to keeping your family healthy, especially during flu seasons or epidemics.
{Convenient Water Refilling}: The top cover of the product is designed for easy removal, making water refilling a breeze. Due to the large 3.5L chamber capacity, it can last all day, covering a wide area to provide a germ-free atmosphere throughout your home.
{Perfect Gift Choice}: Whether for family or friends, this DOMA air purifier is a perfect gift choice. Its multi-functional, elegant and caring design not only enhances the well-being of the recipient, but also highlights your thoughtfulness. Make a wise gifting choice and show your loved ones that you truly care

name: Air Purifier and Aroma Diffuser 500ml Ultrasonic Air
shortDescription: The essential oil diffuser is equipped with a larger 500ml water tank and has a super long working time of 12 hours.Brings you a steady stream of Fragrance even in large rooms.
fullDescription:
【500ml Diffuser, Suitable for Large Room】The essential oil diffuser is equipped with a larger 500ml water tank and has a super long working time of 12 hours.Brings you a steady stream of Fragrance even in large rooms.
【Top-Fill Design, Easy to Use】Our diffusers for essential oils large room comes with wide opening top-fill design allows easier filling and cleaning. Tips: recommend to clean the tank once a week for a better user experience.
【Low Noise Design】The oil diffuser’s noise at work low than 30 db, let your family enjoy a quiet fragrance.
【7 Changing Colors, Soothing Night Light】: The aromatherapy diffuser included 7 different light combinations, which can offers a comforting glow, very suitable for home, meditation, yoga or as a night light.
【Waterless Auto-off, Very Safe】 You can use this humidifiers for bedroom at night. Once the water runs out, the difusor essential oil will automatically shut off for your safety.

name: Air Purifier and Aroma Diffuser Smart Ultrasonic  8L
shortDescription: Versatile Functionality: This device serves as an air purifier, essential oil diffuser, and smart ultrasonic humidifier in one compact unit.
fullDescription:
• Versatile Functionality: This device serves as an air purifier, essential oil diffuser, and smart ultrasonic humidifier in one compact unit.

• Large Capacity: Boasting an 8-litre water tank capacity, it can operate for extended periods without frequent refilling.

• Convenient Controls: Easy to operate with a digital display, timer, and power button right on the unit.

• Remote Control: Allows you to adjust settings from a distance using the included remote control.

• UV Light: Incorporates UV light technology to purify the air and eliminate bacteria, ensuring a healthier environment.

• The main body of the humidifier is separated from the water tank, making adding water convenient and quick. All you need to do is put the water tank under the water pipe, which can be easily filled and cleaned. Adjusting the humidity level of the mist.

• Specially designed for humidification. You can choose your own humidity adjustment, it is also possible to set the humidity to 40% and 90%.

• Large capacity, working under 32dB, especially for the baby, to provide a comfortable and silent environment, sleep mode can be set with a key to raise the LED display light, timer from 1 to 12 hours, when there is any When there is water, the humidifier will automatically turn off.

• Large capacity 8L/gallon air humidifier can provide 27m³/h maximum output and can last 48 hours. Humidification in one bottle can be applied for more than 5,000 square feet to meet the humidification needs of your entire home. Suitable for living room, bedroom, office, dorm room, yoga room, plants, etc.
